nodes.text: Deathwatch hideout was a hideout used by the Mandalorian terrorist group Death Watch on Mandalore's moon, Concordia during the Clone Wars. Initially constructed by Mandalorian miners, the group used the base until it was discovered by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Duchess Satine Kryze in 21 BBY. As the two discovered the group of Mandalorian warriors there, they fought, with Kenobi eventually dueling Pre Vizsla, the former governor of Concordia who was secretly the leader of Death Watch.
